Manjunatha is an automotive startup based in Bengaluru promoted by founders with deep roots in coach building business. Our mission is to build world class coaches in compliance with and with standards above and beyond ARIA guidelines while meeting customer expectations of economy and durability.

We also offer auxiliary services around coaches. We offer overhaul services and also repurpose vehicles for specialised purposes like mobile operation theatres, caravan buses and for air conditioned cargo. You can rest assured that we will ensure timely delivery with unparalleled work quality.
